title: 04/23/2021 - Best Of The Herd
itunes:title: 04/23/2021 - Best Of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to the Browns picking up Baker Mayfield’s 5th year option and why this means Mayfield still has a lot to prove this season. He defends Trevor Lawrence from the recent criticism as the NFL is now less than a week away. He shares some unfortunate news for Broncos fans as it looks like they are back in the market for a franchise quarterback. Plus, Super Bowl champion QB Drew Brees joins the show to tell Colin how he made it in the NFL despite being undersized. 

 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
